column11: Leg Raises and Flutter Kicks (5 minutes)
column12: Leg Raises: Lie on your back lift legs towards the ceiling lower them slowly without touching the ground: 2 sets of 6-8 reps
column13: Flutter Kicks: Lie on your back lift legs off the ground alternate kicking legs up and down in small controlled motions: 2 sets of 15-20 seconds
column16: Plank with Knee to Elbow: From plank position bring right knee to right elbow then switch to left knee to left elbow continue alternating for 6-8 reps on each side
column19: Side Plank with Hip Dips: Hold side plank position dip hips towards the ground and back up: 6-8 reps on each side
column20: Russian Twists: Sit on the ground with knees bent rotate torso side to side: 2 sets of 10-12 reps (each side)
column23: Squats: 4 sets of 8-10 repetitions (with barbell or using gym machines)
